abstract: France’s PSA Peugeot Citroen and China Changan Automobile Group plan to invest $1.2 billion to set up a joint venture to make small, low-emission cars in China.
snippet: France’s PSA Peugeot Citroen and China Changan Automobile Group plan to invest $1.2 billion to set up a joint venture to make small, low-emission cars in China.
lead_paragraph: France’s PSA Peugeot Citroen and China Changan Automobile Group plan to invest $1.2 billion to set up a joint venture to make small, low-emission cars in China, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: Peugeot and Changan in Joint Venture
